languages.text:
All enemies suffering from damage-over-time effects in a 4-cell radius around the Executioner immediately suffer an extra instance of damage from these effects. They must also pass a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Save|7d36cf07583c4450a481d88eaba4f738} penalty or suffer an additional {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}. The effect and type of the resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} depend on the initial damage-over-time effect.
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Bleeding{/g}: Agility resistance test, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}: Willpower resistance test, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g}: Toughness resistance test, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}</indent>
These additional effects are removed at the start of the Executioner's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
All DoTs on all enemies in a 4 cell radius around Executioner immediately deal their damage, and, depending on the type of DoT effect, enemies have to make a saving throw (with a penalty of {uip|Save|7d36cf07583c4450a481d88eaba4f738}) or suffer additional effect.
- Bleeding: Agility save, Blinded
- Burning: Willpower save, Slowed
- Toxin: Toughness save, Staggered
All effects persist until the start of Executioner's next turn.

All enemies under damage-over-time effects in a 4-cell radius around the Executioner immediately suffer an extra instance of damage from these effects and have to pass a resistance test with a −{uip|Save|7d36cf07583c4450a481d88eaba4f738} penalty. Those who fail suffer an additional negative effect. The type of this effect and the type of the resistance test depend on the initial damage-over-time effect.
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Bleeding{/g}: Agility resistance test, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}: Willpower resistance test, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>Toxin: Toughness resistance test, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}</indent>
These additional effects are removed at the start of the Executioner's next turn.

All enemies under damage-over-time effects in a 4-cell radius around the Executioner immediately suffer an extra instance of damage from these effects and have to pass a resistance test with a −{uip|Save|7d36cf07583c4450a481d88eaba4f738} penalty. Those who fail suffer an additional negative effect. The type of this effect and the type of the resistance test depend on the initial damage-over-time effect.
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Bleeding{/g}: Agility resistance test, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}: Willpower resistance test, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>Toxin: Toughness resistance test, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}</indent>
These additional effects are removed at the start of the Executioner's next turn.

All enemies suffering from damage-over-time effects in a 4-cell radius around the Executioner immediately suffer an extra instance of damage from these effects. They must also pass a resistance test with a −{uip|Save|7d36cf07583c4450a481d88eaba4f738} penalty or suffer an additional negative effect. The effect and type of the resistance test depend on the initial damage-over-time effect.
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Bleeding{/g}: Agility resistance test, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}: Willpower resistance test, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>Toxin: Toughness resistance test, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}</indent>
These additional effects are removed at the start of the Executioner's next turn.

All enemies suffering from damage-over-time effects in a 4-cell radius around the Executioner immediately suffer an extra instance of damage from these effects. They must also pass a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Save|7d36cf07583c4450a481d88eaba4f738} penalty or suffer an additional {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}. The effect and type of the resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} depend on the initial damage-over-time effect.
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Bleeding{/g}: Agility resistance test, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}: Willpower resistance test, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g}: Toughness resistance test, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}</indent>
These additional effects are removed at the start of the Executioner's next turn.

languages.text:
Todos los enemigos que sufren efectos de daño continuado en un radio de 4 casillas alrededor del ejecutor reciben de inmediato otra aplicación del daño de esos efectos. También deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|Save|7d36cf07583c4450a481d88eaba4f738} o sufrir un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efecto negativo{/g} adicional. El efecto y el tipo de la {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza dependen del efecto de daño continuado inicial.
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Hemorragia{/g}: prueba de fortaleza de Agilidad, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Quemadura{/g}: prueba de fortaleza de Voluntad, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxina{/g}: prueba de fortaleza de Resistencia, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g}</indent>
Estos efectos adicionales se eliminan al comienzo del próximo turno del ejecutor.

Estos efectos adicionales se eliminan al comienzo del próximo turno del ejecutor.

languages.text:
エクスキューショナーの周囲半径4セル内にいて、継続ダメージ効果を受けているすべての敵は、即座に追加でこれらの効果のダメージを受ける。ペナルティ−{uip|Save|7d36cf07583c4450a481d88eaba4f738}で{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければ、追加で{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}を受ける。抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}の効果と種類は、元の継続ダメージ効果に依存する。
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}：敏捷抵抗判定、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}：意志力抵抗判定、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}：耐久力抵抗判定、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}</indent>
これらの追加効果はエクスキューショナーの次のターン開始時に取り除かれる。
languages.original_text:
All enemies suffering from damage-over-time effects in a 4-cell radius around the Executioner immediately suffer an extra instance of damage from these effects. They must also pass a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Save|7d36cf07583c4450a481d88eaba4f738} penalty or suffer an additional {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}. These additional effects are removed at the start of the Executioner's next turn.

traits.locale_text:

-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}：敏捷抵抗判定、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}：意志力抵抗判定、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}：耐久力抵抗判定、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}</indent>
これらの追加効果はエクスキューショナーの次のターン開始時に取り除かれる。

languages.text:
行刑者周围4格内所有敌人受到持续伤害效果影响时，都会立即承受该效果带来的伤害。此外，受影响的敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|Save|7d36cf07583c4450a481d88eaba4f738}减值。若未能通过检定，则会受到额外的{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}。抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}的类别与效果取决于初始持续伤害效果的种类。
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}：敏捷抗性检定，失败则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}状态。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}：意志抗性检定，失败则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}：坚韧抗性检定，失败则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态。</indent>
上述附加效果在行刑者下个回合开始时失效。

- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}：意志抗性检定，失败则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}：坚韧抗性检定，失败则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态。</indent>
上述附加效果在行刑者下个回合开始时失效。

languages.text:
Alle mit Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekten belegten Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Zellen um den Henker erleiden durch diese Effekte sofort eine zusätzliche Schadensinstanz. Ferner müssen sie eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem Abzug von -{uip|Save|7d36cf07583c4450a481d88eaba4f738} bestehen, um nicht mit einem weiteren {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativen Effekt{/g} belegt zu werden. Effekt und Typ der Widerstands{g|Encyclopedia:Test}probe{/g} basieren auf dem ersten Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekt.
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}: Beweglichkeit-Widerstandsprobe, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}: Willenskraft-Widerstandsprobe, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}: Zähigkeit-Widerstandsprobe, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}taumelnd{/g}</indent>
Diese zusätzlichen Effekte werden zu Beginn des nächsten Zuges des Henkers entfernt.

Diese zusätzlichen Effekte werden zu Beginn des nächsten Zuges des Henkers entfernt.

languages.text:
Les ennemis souffrant d'effets de dégâts progressifs dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'exécuteur subit instantanément une instance de dégâts de ces effets. Ils doivent également réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|Save|7d36cf07583c4450a481d88eaba4f738}. En cas d'échec, ils subissent un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effet négatif{/g} supplémentaire. L'effet et le type de {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} dépendent de l'effet de dégâts progressifs initial.
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} : test de résistance d'Agilité, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} : test de résistance de Volonté, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} : test de résistance d'Endurance, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g}</indent>
Les effets supplémentaires sont dissipés au début du prochain tour de l'exécuteur.
languages.original_text:
All enemies suffering from damage-over-time effects in a 4-cell radius around the Executioner immediately suffer an extra instance of damage from these effects. They must also pass a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Save|7d36cf07583c4450a481d88eaba4f738} penalty or suffer an additional {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}. The effect and type of the resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} depend on the initial damage-over-time effect.
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Bleeding{/g}: Agility resistance test, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}: Willpower resistance test, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g}: Toughness resistance test, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}</indent>
These additional effects are removed at the start of the Executioner's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
Les ennemis souffrant d'effets de dégâts progressifs dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'exécuteur subit instantanément une instance de dégâts de ces effets. Ils doivent également réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|Save|7d36cf07583c4450a481d88eaba4f738}. En cas d'échec, ils subissent un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effet négatif{/g} supplémentaire. L'effet et le type de {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} dépendent de l'effet de dégâts progressifs initial.
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} : test de résistance d'Agilité, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} : test de résistance de Volonté, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} : test de résistance d'Endurance, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g}</indent>
Les effets supplémentaires sont dissipés au début du prochain tour de l'exécuteur.

languages.text:
Все противники, на которых наложены эффекты периодического урона, в радиусе 4 клеток вокруг палача немедленно получают внеочередной урон от этих эффектов. Также противники совершают {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}проверку на сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|Save|7d36cf07583c4450a481d88eaba4f738} и в случае провала получают дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативный эффект{/g}. Этот эффект и проверяемая характеристика определяются типом действующего на противника эффекта.{g|Encyclopedia:Test}{/g}
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Кровотечение{/g}: проверка Ловкости на сопротивление, накладывается {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепление{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Горение{/g}: проверка Воли на сопротивление, накладывается {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедление{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Отравление{/g}: проверка Выносливости на сопротивление, накладывается {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g}</indent>
Эти дополнительные эффекты снимаются в начале следующего хода палача.
languages.original_text:
All enemies suffering from damage-over-time effects in a 4-cell radius around the Executioner immediately suffer an extra instance of damage from these effects. They must also pass a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Save|7d36cf07583c4450a481d88eaba4f738} penalty or suffer an additional {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}. The effect and type of the resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} depend on the initial damage-over-time effect.
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Bleeding{/g}: Agility resistance test, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}: Willpower resistance test, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g}: Toughness resistance test, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}</indent>
These additional effects are removed at the start of the Executioner's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
Все противники, на которых наложены эффекты периодического урона, в радиусе 4 клеток вокруг палача немедленно получают внеочередной урон от этих эффектов. Также противники совершают {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}проверку на сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|Save|7d36cf07583c4450a481d88eaba4f738} и в случае провала получают дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативный эффект{/g}. Этот эффект и проверяемая характеристика определяются типом действующего на противника эффекта.{g|Encyclopedia:Test}{/g}
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Кровотечение{/g}: проверка Ловкости на сопротивление, накладывается {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепление{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Горение{/g}: проверка Воли на сопротивление, накладывается {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедление{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Отравление{/g}: проверка Выносливости на сопротивление, накладывается {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g}</indent>
Эти дополнительные эффекты снимаются в начале следующего хода палача.

Все противники, на которых наложены эффекты периодического урона, в радиусе 4 клеток вокруг палача немедленно получают внеочередной урон от этих эффектов. -<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Отравление{/g}: проверка Выносливости на сопротивление, накладывается {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g}</indent>
Эти дополнительные эффекты снимаются в начале следующего хода палача.
